definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Lunar olivine was created by great volcanoes called fire fountains, which sprayed superheated lava into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月之橄欖石產生於名爲“火噴泉”的巨型火山。

sentences.english: It is made of Magnesium and Iron Silicate , and it is a member of the Chrysolite mineral family.
sentences.chinese: 它是由鎂，矽鐵，它是一個成員橄欖石礦物家庭。

sentences.english: This resembles volcanic ash, which is predominantly composed of minerals such as pyroxene and olivine.
sentences.chinese: 這類似於火山灰，這是主要組成礦物如輝石和橄欖石。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated pierced earrings with Jonquil crystal lemon and leaf in Peridot crystal.
sentences.chinese: 銠鍍穿耳環與信奉水晶檸檬葉在橄欖石晶體。

sentences.english: Peridot is given as a symbol of fame, dignity, and protection.
sentences.chinese: 橄欖石是給出一個聲譽，尊嚴的象徵，和保護。

sentences.english: These are globules of once-molten rock trapped inside crystals in the rock.
sentences.chinese: 這些源自熔岩的球狀岩石被包裹在橄欖石晶體裏。

sentences.english: Forsteritic olivine almost invariably represents primary precipitate material .
sentences.chinese: 鎂質橄欖石几乎總是代表了原生沉澱物。

sentences.english: A consistent zonal arrangement is a constant feature of those complexes that contain olivine-bearing rocks .
sentences.chinese: 穩定的帶狀排列是這些含橄欖石巖類雜巖的固定特點。

sentences.english: So, with its cloudy walls of chrysolite , jasper, and sapphire.
sentences.chinese: 於是，鑲嵌橄欖石，碧玉，藍寶石的雲牆中間。

sentences.english: Olivine-type LiFePO4 cathode material was successfully synthesized by co-precipitation method.
sentences.chinese: 採用共沉澱法合成了橄欖石型磷酸亞鐵鋰正極材料。

sentences.english: The olivine grains in the troctolite of the Upper Zone are rather short and thick.
sentences.chinese: 上巖帶橄長巖中的橄欖石顆粒相當短粗。

sentences.english: The olivine from the Laoheishan is chrysolite.
sentences.chinese: 老黑山熔岩中的橄欖石是貴橄欖石。

sentences.english: The olivine from the Laoheishan is chrysolite.
sentences.chinese: 老黑山熔岩中的橄欖石是貴橄欖石。

sentences.english: Peridot raw material and Peridot finished product.
sentences.chinese: 主要以批發銷售橄欖石原料及成品爲主。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated hair clip with Light Siam crystal apple and leaf in Peridot crystal.
sentences.chinese: 銠鍍頭髮夾輕暹水晶蘋果和葉子在橄欖石晶體。
